languages.text: "Но куда больше меня поразила ваша щедрость. Провизия, которую от вашего имени раздают на улицах столицы, станет спасением для многих, кого обездолила атака {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Но куда больше меня поразила ваша щедрость. Провизия, которую от вашего имени раздают на улицах столицы, станет спасением для многих, кого обездолила атака ксеносов".

languages.text: "But I was so much more amazed by your generosity. The provisions that are being handed out in the streets of the capital will make the difference between life and death for many of those who lost everything in the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} attack."
languages.original_text: "Но куда больше меня поразила ваша щедрость. Провизия, которую от вашего имени раздают на улицах столицы, станет спасением для многих, кого обездолила атака {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "But I was so much more amazed by your generosity. The provisions that are being handed out in the streets of the capital will make the difference between life and death for many of those who lost everything in the xenos attack."

"But I was so much more amazed by your generosity. The provisions that are being handed out in the streets of the capital will make the difference between life and death for many of those who lost everything in the xenos attack."

"But I was so much more amazed by your generosity. The provisions that are being handed out in the streets of the capital will make the difference between life and death for many of those who lost everything in the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} attack."

"But I was so much more amazed by your generosity. The provisions that are being handed out in the streets of the capital will make the difference between life and death for many of those who lost everything in the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} attack."

"But I was so much more amazed by your generosity. The provisions that are being handed out in the streets of the capital will make the difference between life and death for many of those who lost everything in the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} attack."

languages.text: 「ですが、それよりも驚いたのは陛下の寛大なお心です。首都の街路で配られている食料は、{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の襲撃で全てを失った、大勢の人々の生死を分けるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "But I was so much more amazed by your generosity. The provisions that are being handed out in the streets of the capital will make the difference between life and death for many of those who lost everything in the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} attack."

traits.locale_text: 「ですが、それよりも驚いたのは陛下の寛大なお心です。首都の街路で配られている食料は、{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の襲撃で全てを失った、大勢の人々の生死を分けるでしょう」

languages.text: “但您的慷慨大度更令我赞叹不已。您在首都街头发放了大量物资，对那些在{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}袭击中失去一切的人而言，这会给他们存活下去的机会。”
languages.original_text: "But I was so much more amazed by your generosity. The provisions that are being handed out in the streets of the capital will make the difference between life and death for many of those who lost everything in the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} attack."

traits.locale_text: “但您的慷慨大度更令我赞叹不已。您在首都街头发放了大量物资，对那些在{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}袭击中失去一切的人而言，这会给他们存活下去的机会。”

languages.text: «Sin embargo, estoy más que asombrada por su generosidad. Las provisiones que se están repartiendo por las calles de la capital marcarán la diferencia entre la vida y la muerte para mucha gente que lo perdió todo en el ataque {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}».
languages.original_text: "But I was so much more amazed by your generosity. The provisions that are being handed out in the streets of the capital will make the difference between life and death for many of those who lost everything in the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} attack."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, estoy más que asombrada por su generosidad. Las provisiones que se están repartiendo por las calles de la capital marcarán la diferencia entre la vida y la muerte para mucha gente que lo perdió todo en el ataque {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}».

languages.text: « Mais je suis bien plus émerveillée par l'étendue de votre générosité. La distribution de provisions dans les rues de la capitale sera salvatrice pour ceux qui ont tout perdu lors de l'attaque des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "But I was so much more amazed by your generosity. The provisions that are being handed out in the streets of the capital will make the difference between life and death for many of those who lost everything in the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} attack."

traits.locale_text: « Mais je suis bien plus émerveillée par l'étendue de votre générosité. La distribution de provisions dans les rues de la capitale sera salvatrice pour ceux qui ont tout perdu lors de l'attaque des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}. »

languages.text: "Aber viel mehr erstaunt hat mich Eure Großzügigkeit. Die auf den Straßen der Hauptstadt ausgegebenen Rationen werden für viele, die bei dem {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}-Angriff alles verloren haben, den Unterschied zwischen Leben und Tod bedeuten."
languages.original_text: "But I was so much more amazed by your generosity. The provisions that are being handed out in the streets of the capital will make the difference between life and death for many of those who lost everything in the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} attack."

traits.locale_text: "Aber viel mehr erstaunt hat mich Eure Großzügigkeit. Die auf den Straßen der Hauptstadt ausgegebenen Rationen werden für viele, die bei dem {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}-Angriff alles verloren haben, den Unterschied zwischen Leben und Tod bedeuten."

languages.text: "Cömertliğinizse beni çok daha hayrete düşürdü. Başkentin sokaklarında dağıtılan erzaklar, {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g} saldırısında her şeyini yitiren birçoklarının hayata tutunmasını sağlayacak."
languages.original_text: "But I was so much more amazed by your generosity. The provisions that are being handed out in the streets of the capital will make the difference between life and death for many of those who lost everything in the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} attack."

traits.locale_text: "Cömertliğiniz ise beni çok daha hayrete düşürdü. Başkentin sokaklarında dağıtılan erzaklar, {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenolar{/g}ın saldırısında her şeyini yitiren pek çok kişinin hayata tutunmasını sağlayacak."
